title: The 17 Best Places to Buy Engagement Rings Online
description: From classics like Tiffany & Co. to modern heroes like Jean Dousset.
excerpt: From classics like Tiffany & Co. to modern heroes like Jessica McCormack, discover the best places to buy engagement rings online.
text: Billiant Earth Freesia Hidden Halo Diamond Engagement RingIf convenience is a priority in your shopping experience, Brilliant Earth makes it incredibly easy to find and order a special piece for your partner. In addition to having a vast selection of ring designs that are customizable, Brilliant Earth’s customer service includes sales reps who can answer any questions you may have on your journey. Plus, the brand offers a free lifetime warranty against manufacturing defects, which is super helpful when making such an important decision online.Jean Dousset Hayden Solitaire Lab Diamond Engagement RingFor impeccable craftsmanship, turn to Jean Dousset, the great-great-grandson of Louis Cartier (yes, that Cartier). The jewelry designer has a flagship store in West Hollywood, but if you aren’t in the area, you can virtually experience the luxurious offerings—like the hidden halo creation here. The most exciting part about the brand’s evolution is Dousset’s focus on making exquisite diamonds more accessible at inclusive price points through meticulously selecting the very best lab-grown diamonds. There’s a misconception that lab-grown diamonds aren’t real diamonds, but they are. “Lab diamonds have the same optical and chemical properties as mined diamonds,” Dousset’s website perfectly explains. “The sparkle is the exact same. The only difference is their origin.” Instead of being mined from the earth, the same pressure and conditions are replicated in a lab using cutting-edge technology. What does that mean price-wise? The cost of a $10,000 ring could now be reduced to about $2,400.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowShane & Co. Lucette Cathedral Engagement RingShane & Co. has several locations across the country, but the brand also makes it incredibly easy to find a beautifully crafted engagement ring online. The highlight of the shopping experience goes beyond just picking out the perfect gem and setting. Shane & Co. offers free resizing and a warranty for life as well as free cleanings and lost stone replacements. Jessica McCormack 5.02ct East-West Cushion Diamond Button Back RingIt’s always refreshing to find a jeweler who knows how to marry (no pun intended) traditional elements with modern details. That’s exactly what Jessica McCormack has become beloved for. Find antique-inspired gems fastened in modern settings that add an of-the-moment sense of ease to the world of fine jewelry. Here, McCormack takes a timeless solitaire and literally flips it on its side for a unique approach to engagement jewelry. You’ll have to call to request pricing on this stunner, but there are plenty of other breathtaking engagement rings ready for checkout on Jessica McCormack’s website.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowRitani The Ivy Halo Engagement RingHere’s a New York-based brand that has sold nearly one million engagement rings in the past 25 years. Already have a setting? Find the perfect diamond from Ritani’s assortment of gemologist-approved stones. One of the unique parts about shopping on the brand’s website is that the brand is refreshingly honest about pricing, showing you the cost to purchase its diamonds, the fulfillment rates, and Ritani’s markup.Vera Wang Wish 1-3/8 ct tw Diamond Engagement Ring 14K White Gold RingFor an elevated mall brand experience, Vera Wang Wish offers a selection of delicately designed pieces at Jared. Designer Vera Wang has become the queen of wedding dresses, so it only made sense that she expanded her reach into the engagement ring arena. Some of the designs at Jared come with a hidden sapphire, so you and your partner can easily check the something blue off of your wedding day must-haves.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowJames Allen IGI Lab-Grown 1.30 Carat E-VS1 Oval Cut Diamond Classic Split Shank Solitaire Diamond Engagement RingBeing able to inspect a ring’s details is one of the most important aspects of shopping online. James Allen’s website offers 360-degree look at its designs, settings, and the stones. Plus, there are hundreds of reviews to sift through, including ones with sweet photos of happy couples.Bliss Diamond Certified 4.00Ct Radiant Cut Diamond Engagement Ring Gold Lab Grown in 14K White GoldDon’t forget to check the offerings from big box retailers like Nordstrom. The assortment includes an array of brands like the affordable pieces by Bliss Diamonds. The brand offers great deals on lab-grown diamonds rings, necklaces, and so much more.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowGrown Brilliance 1 ctw Emerald Lab Grown Diamond Station Engagement RingLeading the charge in conflict-free diamonds, Grown Brilliance has a collection of lab-grown diamonds that are undeniably beautiful. You might have seen a few celebrities wearing Grown Brilliance, from Ariana Grande’s studs to Demi Moore’s hoops. The highlight of the collection, of course, is the vast assortment of engagement rings to pick from and customize yourself. Now through January 21, Grown Brilliance is offering a free ring setting with the purchase of any 3-carat or larger diamond.Tiffany & Co. Tiffany Soleste® Round Brilliant Engagement Ring in PlatinumIt really doesn’t get any more iconic than surprising them with a little blue box from Tiffany & Co.’s engagement ring assortment. The lineup includes classics that transcend time and diamonds that are—most importantly—ethically sourced. Of course, it all comes with a lifetime of service from one of the most celebrated jewelry brands of all time.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowDorsey Petite Spencer Lab White Sapphire RingFounded by Meg Strachan and named after her grandmother, Dorsey draws inspiration from vintage designs to deliver incredibly crafted jewels for the modern woman. Select between lab-grown white sapphires or diamond stones to customize your precious piece.Vrai Toi Et Moi 18K Yellow Gold & 3.50 TCW Lab-Grown Diamond Engagement Ring - Yellow Gold - Size 7For dazzling lab-grown diamonds, turn to Vrai. Shop its beautifully designed rings online or at one of its showrooms in New York, Boston, Chicago, Los Angeles, and San Francisco. Have a specific idea in mind? Vrai specializes in creating custom-made engagement rings, too. The best part about shopping at Vrai is the post-investment treatment. Customers receive annual cleanings, a lifetime warranty for manufacturing defects and the grade of the diamond, and complimentary resizing.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowDe Beers DB Classic Trio Emerald-Cut Diamond RingIf you’re looking for prestige marketing, De Beers is the iconic brand that turned the engagement ring into the symbol of commitment that it is known for today. Founded in 1888, the label is the go-to for a luxurious experience, but the ultimate highlight: De Beers prioritizes ethically sourcing its stones and responsible mining.Almasika 18K Yellow Gold Universum Pave Diamond Pinky RingEngagement rings have become a symbol of unity, and Almasika is a fine jewelry brand that’s rooted in symbolic details. For example, the circles here represent the universe and are inspired by the symbols you’d find chiseled in Sahara boulders and Arizona valleys. It’s the perfect way to celebrate the person who is at the center of your universe.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowSaks Fifth Avenue Collection 14K White Gold & 2.55 TCW Lab-Grown Diamond Cushion Engagement RingAgain, don’t forget the shopping ease of tried-and-true department stores. Places like Saks Fifth Avenue offer the convenience of trying rings on in person or an easy-to-count-on virtual shopping experience. In the retailer’s eponymous jewelry lineup, you’ll find expertly cut diamonds and beautifully designed settings—all at approachable price points.Cartier Ballerine SolitaireFounded in 1847, Cartier is a trusted jeweler to turn to for all of your most important moments. While its watches have gathered much attention, the brand’s engagement rings are also meticulously crafted. If elegance is at the top of your wish list, start your shopping journey at Cartier with its classic solitaire rings or pick your own stone and setting for a custom Cartier collab.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowMateo Slanted 14kt gold ring with topaz and diamondsIf you’re shopping for a modern bride who is anti-basic jewelry, they’ll appreciate the contemporary design offerings from Mateo. Find trendy east-west rings anchored with amethyst gems and slanted pear topaz rings trimmed with round-cut diamonds.Why Trust ELLEEvery product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. html:
Billiant Earth Freesia Hidden Halo Diamond Engagement Ring

If convenience is a priority in your shopping experience, Brilliant Earth makes it incredibly easy to find and order a special piece for your partner. In addition to having a vast selection of ring designs that are customizable, Brilliant Earth’s customer service includes sales reps who can answer any questions you may have on your journey. Plus, the brand offers a free lifetime warranty against manufacturing defects, which is super helpful when making such an important decision online.

Jean Dousset Hayden Solitaire Lab Diamond Engagement Ring

For impeccable craftsmanship, turn to Jean Dousset, the great-great-grandson of Louis Cartier (yes, that Cartier). The jewelry designer has a flagship store in West Hollywood, but if you aren’t in the area, you can virtually experience the luxurious offerings—like the hidden halo creation here.

The most exciting part about the brand’s evolution is Dousset’s focus on making exquisite diamonds more accessible at inclusive price points through meticulously selecting the very best lab-grown diamonds. There’s a misconception that lab-grown diamonds aren’t real diamonds, but they are. “Lab diamonds have the same optical and chemical properties as mined diamonds,” Dousset’s website perfectly explains. “The sparkle is the exact same. The only difference is their origin.” Instead of being mined from the earth, the same pressure and conditions are replicated in a lab using cutting-edge technology. What does that mean price-wise? The cost of a $10,000 ring could now be reduced to about $2,400.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Shane & Co. Lucette Cathedral Engagement Ring

Shane & Co. has several locations across the country, but the brand also makes it incredibly easy to find a beautifully crafted engagement ring online. The highlight of the shopping experience goes beyond just picking out the perfect gem and setting. Shane & Co. offers free resizing and a warranty for life as well as free cleanings and lost stone replacements.

Jessica McCormack 5.02ct East-West Cushion Diamond Button Back Ring

It’s always refreshing to find a jeweler who knows how to marry (no pun intended) traditional elements with modern details. That’s exactly what Jessica McCormack has become beloved for. Find antique-inspired gems fastened in modern settings that add an of-the-moment sense of ease to the world of fine jewelry. Here, McCormack takes a timeless solitaire and literally flips it on its side for a unique approach to engagement jewelry.

You’ll have to call to request pricing on this stunner, but there are plenty of other breathtaking engagement rings ready for checkout on Jessica McCormack’s website.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Ritani The Ivy Halo Engagement Ring

Here’s a New York-based brand that has sold nearly one million engagement rings in the past 25 years. Already have a setting? Find the perfect diamond from Ritani’s assortment of gemologist-approved stones. One of the unique parts about shopping on the brand’s website is that the brand is refreshingly honest about pricing, showing you the cost to purchase its diamonds, the fulfillment rates, and Ritani’s markup.

Vera Wang Wish 1-3/8 ct tw Diamond Engagement Ring 14K White Gold Ring

For an elevated mall brand experience, Vera Wang Wish offers a selection of delicately designed pieces at Jared. Designer Vera Wang has become the queen of wedding dresses, so it only made sense that she expanded her reach into the engagement ring arena. Some of the designs at Jared come with a hidden sapphire, so you and your partner can easily check the something blue off of your wedding day must-haves.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

James Allen IGI Lab-Grown 1.30 Carat E-VS1 Oval Cut Diamond Classic Split Shank Solitaire Diamond Engagement Ring

Being able to inspect a ring’s details is one of the most important aspects of shopping online. James Allen’s website offers 360-degree look at its designs, settings, and the stones. Plus, there are hundreds of reviews to sift through, including ones with sweet photos of happy couples.

Bliss Diamond Certified 4.00Ct Radiant Cut Diamond Engagement Ring Gold Lab Grown in 14K White Gold

Don’t forget to check the offerings from big box retailers like Nordstrom. The assortment includes an array of brands like the affordable pieces by Bliss Diamonds. The brand offers great deals on lab-grown diamonds rings, necklaces, and so much more.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Grown Brilliance 1 ctw Emerald Lab Grown Diamond Station Engagement Ring

Leading the charge in conflict-free diamonds, Grown Brilliance has a collection of lab-grown diamonds that are undeniably beautiful. You might have seen a few celebrities wearing Grown Brilliance, from Ariana Grande’s studs to Demi Moore’s hoops. The highlight of the collection, of course, is the vast assortment of engagement rings to pick from and customize yourself. Now through January 21, Grown Brilliance is offering a free ring setting with the purchase of any 3-carat or larger diamond.

Tiffany & Co. Tiffany Soleste® Round Brilliant Engagement Ring in Platinum

It really doesn’t get any more iconic than surprising them with a little blue box from Tiffany & Co.’s engagement ring assortment. The lineup includes classics that transcend time and diamonds that are—most importantly—ethically sourced. Of course, it all comes with a lifetime of service from one of the most celebrated jewelry brands of all time.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Dorsey Petite Spencer Lab White Sapphire Ring

Founded by Meg Strachan and named after her grandmother, Dorsey draws inspiration from vintage designs to deliver incredibly crafted jewels for the modern woman. Select between lab-grown white sapphires or diamond stones to customize your precious piece.

Vrai Toi Et Moi 18K Yellow Gold & 3.50 TCW Lab-Grown Diamond Engagement Ring - Yellow Gold - Size 7

For dazzling lab-grown diamonds, turn to Vrai. Shop its beautifully designed rings online or at one of its showrooms in New York, Boston, Chicago, Los Angeles, and San Francisco. Have a specific idea in mind? Vrai specializes in creating custom-made engagement rings, too. The best part about shopping at Vrai is the post-investment treatment. Customers receive annual cleanings, a lifetime warranty for manufacturing defects and the grade of the diamond, and complimentary resizing.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

De Beers DB Classic Trio Emerald-Cut Diamond Ring

If you’re looking for prestige marketing, De Beers is the iconic brand that turned the engagement ring into the symbol of commitment that it is known for today. Founded in 1888, the label is the go-to for a luxurious experience, but the ultimate highlight: De Beers prioritizes ethically sourcing its stones and responsible mining.

Almasika 18K Yellow Gold Universum Pave Diamond Pinky Ring

Engagement rings have become a symbol of unity, and Almasika is a fine jewelry brand that’s rooted in symbolic details. For example, the circles here represent the universe and are inspired by the symbols you’d find chiseled in Sahara boulders and Arizona valleys. It’s the perfect way to celebrate the person who is at the center of your universe.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Saks Fifth Avenue Collection 14K White Gold & 2.55 TCW Lab-Grown Diamond Cushion Engagement Ring

Again, don’t forget the shopping ease of tried-and-true department stores. Places like Saks Fifth Avenue offer the convenience of trying rings on in person or an easy-to-count-on virtual shopping experience. In the retailer’s eponymous jewelry lineup, you’ll find expertly cut diamonds and beautifully designed settings—all at approachable price points.

Cartier Ballerine Solitaire

Founded in 1847, Cartier is a trusted jeweler to turn to for all of your most important moments. While its watches have gathered much attention, the brand’s engagement rings are also meticulously crafted. If elegance is at the top of your wish list, start your shopping journey at Cartier with its classic solitaire rings or pick your own stone and setting for a custom Cartier collab.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Mateo Slanted 14kt gold ring with topaz and diamonds

If you’re shopping for a modern bride who is anti-basic jewelry, they’ll appreciate the contemporary design offerings from Mateo. Find trendy east-west rings anchored with amethyst gems and slanted pear topaz rings trimmed with round-cut diamonds.

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
